tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I had visited Dr. Priya for teeth scaling and filling. I had a nice experience. Dr. Priya is very calm and friendly and explains the condition and treatment approaches in detail. She is very patient and cooperative during the treatment. I will strongly recommend Dr.Priya for any dental issues. Thanks.
reply_text: Thank you so much for taking out time n review, glad to know that u had good experience.

review:
Dr Priya treated me with root canal and tooth cap procedure.
She was always polite, patient and professional.
The tooth issue was explained in good detail, options were politely discussed and she did a thorough job with immense patience.
Very professional experience, good hygienic place/practices and a reassuring place for dental treatment
reply_text: Thank you for your valuable feedback Mr Sriram, glad to know that you had good experience at our dental care!

review: Doctor is very friendly and good at explaining the issue root cause and also the required surgery. I have been visiting Dr. Priya from almost around 1 year now and really glad to find her. Will definitely recommend the doctor.
reply_text: Thank you so much for positive feedback!

review:
Doctor is very friendly and she did the tooth filling very perfectly.
Explained the issue in detail an fix it properly.
reply_text: Thank for your positive feedback sir!

review: Met Dr Priya for my 6 yr old son’s cavities. She explained everything and the procedure not only to me but also to my son so he could cooperate. he result was that we could do everything quickly in one sitting. Thanks a lot Dr.
reply_text: Thank you for your positive feedback sir.
